Translations.Text: Ara abasya'i amara akasera burujasamuha srsti karechi [1] ebam darsakadera jan'ya seguloke susobhita karechi
ebam pratyeka abhisapta sayatana hate amara seguloke suraksita karechi
kintu ke'u curi kare [1] sunate ca'ile [2] pradipta sikha [3] tara pascad'dhabana kare
Ara yamina, etake amara bistrta karechi, tate parbatamala sthapana karechi; ebam amara tate pratyeka bastu udagata karechi suparimitabhabe
Ara amara tate jibikara byabastha karechi tomadera jan'ya ebam tomara yadera riyikadata na'o tadera jan'ya'o
Ara amadera kache'i ache pratyeka bastura bhandara ebam amara ta parijnata parimane'i nayila kare thaki
Ara amara brsti-garbha bayu patha'i, tarapara akasa hate pani nayila kare ta tomaderake pana karate de'i [1]; athaca tomara nijera ta bhandare jamakari na'o
Ara amara'i jibana dana kari o mrtyu ghata'i ebam amara'i curanta malikanara adhikari
Ara abasya'i amara tomadera madhya theke yara agragami hayeche taderake jani ebam abasya'i jani taderake yara pascate gamanakari
Ara niscaya apanara raba taderake samabeta karabena; niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna
